name: Clawslands
description:
Welcome to Clawslands

Clawslands is a short platform game experience based on NES games.

A nameless traveler begins his journey, but first, he must leave an old building inhabited by ancient beings.

Controls

Keyboard

ARROWS: move

Z: Jump

X: Weak Attack

C: Strong Attack

Gamepad

Left Thumbstick / Directional Pad: move

A: Jump

X: Weak Attack

Y: Strong Attack
